ValidationRule.description: Updated validation rule to look to Flights Ticketed checkbox - previously order status was used (Exported / Ready for Export)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Flights_Ticketed__c = true, NOT ( ISCHANGED(Cancellation_Request__c)), NOT ( ISCHANGED( update_order__c )), NOT ( $Permission.Lock_Orders_On_Export ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This order has been Ticketed for Flights - you are unable to make changes to this booking. Please refer to your TL for further assistance.
